author: Jason Silverstein
title: Barr compares shutdowns to "house arrest," threatens legal action
description: The attorney general called stay-at-home orders "unprecedented burdens on civil liberties."
content: Attorney General William Barr on Tuesday compared coronavirus shutdowns to "house arrest" and suggested the Justice Department could take legal action against states for their restrictions. His comments come after President Trump has encouraged protesters to … [+2454 chars]
